channel.title: vmware on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in vmware on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Summary because I used Ansible's Vmware system module
item.description: #Introduction There was a case where I wanted to make a guest VM of Vmware with Ansible like the title and want to use it in various ways, so I tried it with the opportunity. By the way, I thought it would be convenient to use Dynamic Inventory, so I tried it. Operation verification environment Vmware side -VMware vCenter Server Appliance, 6.7.0, 42000 -VMware ESXi, 6.7.0, 13006603 Client (Ansible execution environment) side -OS: CentOS 7 -I also tried using python:latest of Docker -Python 3.
